name: obsidian-copy-document-as-html
description: Copy the current document to clipboard as HTML, including images, diagrams etc...

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && copy main.js C:\obsidianvault2\.obsidian\plugins\copy-document-as-html-mpe
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
